resources.string: No current vital signs to display
Please enter a correct username and password.

Login Screen

Login to the app by entering a username and password. Based on the user role you will be redirected to the Nurse Screen or to the Doctor Screen.

Nurse Screen

Urgency Tab: displays a list of patients sorted by urgency in descending order.
Sent to Doctor Tab: displays a list of patients that have been sent to the doctor.
Click on a patient in the list to open the Patient Screen.
Click to look up existing patients based on their health card number.
Click to add and sign in a new patient in the ER.
Click to look up a patient\'s medical record by their health card.

Doctor Screen

Sent to Doctor Tab: displays a list of patients that have been sent to the doctor.
Click on a patient in the list to open the Patient Screen.
Click to look up existing patients based on their health card number.
Click to look up a patient\'s medical record by their health card.

Patient Screen

Info Tab: Displays patient information including ERVisit details if the patient is signed in.
Click to look up a patient\'s medical record by their health card.
Vitals Tab: Visible when the patient is signed in. Displays a list of vitals taken in descending order.
Click on to sign the patient out of the ER. (Visible only for patients signed in the ER).

Features Unique to Nurse:

Click on to sign the patient in the ER (Visible only for patients not signed in the ER).
Click to send the patient to the doctor (Visible only for patients signed in the ER).
Click to add patient vitals.

Features Unique to Doctor:

Prescriptions Tab: Visible when the patient is signed in. Displays a list of prescriptions.
Click on to add a prescription.

Hint: Use the back button to return to the Nurse/Doctor Screen.
